lastUpdated.description: Last updated timestamp. Datetime in ISO format

numericId.description: Inventoryâ€™s unique numeric ID (assigned in ascending order). Primarily for sorting and filtering when crawling all inventories.

enabled.description: Whether the item is available for preorder.

message.description: A message the buyer will see when the item is out of stock and preorder is enabled.

limit.description: Number of products that can be preordered after stock reaches zero.

availableForPreorder.description: Whether the variant is available for preorder. When true, the variant is out of stock and preorder is enabled on inventory level.

inStock.description: Whether the product is listed as in stock.

quantity.description: Quantity currently left in inventory. Optional.
